Adopt a Cat

Adopting a cat from Meow Rescue is a rewarding experience. Our adoption process ensures that each cat finds the right forever home.

When you adopt from us, you're not just gaining a new family member â€” you're also supporting our ongoing mission to help more cats in need throughout our community.

Adoption Process

Our adoption process includes:

  1. Browsing our available cats online or meeting them at an adoption event
  2. Completing an adoption application
  3. Home visit to ensure your home is safe for a cat
  4. Adoption fee payment (which covers spay/neuter, vaccinations, and microchipping)
  5. Taking your new family member home!

Adoption Fees

Our adoption fees help cover the cost of care for our cats:

  • Kittens (under 1 year): $150
  • Adult cats (1-7 years): $100
  • Senior cats (8+ years): $75
